rqt_quadcoptergui Documentation

rqt_quadcoptergui

The rqt_quadcoptergui package

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/rqt_quadcoptergui

rqt_quadcoptergui

This package provides code for controlling Quadrotors to track objects, avoid obstacles, and perform parameter estimation for system identification. The Class rqt_quadcoptergui::QuadcopterGui provides the graphical interface for enabling several of these functionalities. The class OnboardNodeHandler provides the backend logic which sends the commands to several of the subclasses based on the commands from Gui
